The films were characterized with X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM), and spectroscopic ellipsometry (SE).Five samples of Ni<sub><ital>x</ital></sub>W<sub>1-x</sub><ital> </ital>oxide, with <ital>x </ital>equal to 0, 0.05, 0.19, 0.43 and 0.90 were studied. Figure 2 shows, as an example, experimental and fitted model data on Ψ and Δ for a Ni<sub>0.19</sub>W<sub>0.81</sub> oxide film on Si.
